author: Empyre65

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content:

posts.author: satayay
posts.content:
That is a good damage dealer.
Though, why do you take armor skin if you will have such low AC anyways? You could take epic toughness or epic will instead. That would balance your will saves a bit more up to 23 at 40th, or increase your HP.

posts.author: HipMaestro
posts.content: The build may be better sacrificing the 1 monk AC & 1 WM ki dmg to pick up another epic feat by going Monk9/Ftr 24/WM7 (any WM-related build has an issue with accruing adequate feats). Saves will remain the same either way. The few extra HPs gained is secondary IMO.
